properties.areaDesc: New Madrid, MO; Pemiscot, MO; Lake, TN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 15 at 11:23AM CST until January 25 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Mississippi River...Obion
River...Saint Francis River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Mississippi River at Tiptonville
* until Friday January 24.
* At 11 AM Wednesday the stage was 38.2 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring AND Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 40.0 feet on Sunday January 19.
* Flood stage is 37.0 feet.
* The river rose above flood stage Tuesday January 14 and will
continue rising to near 40.0 feet by Sunday January 19. The river
will fall below flood stage Friday January 24.
* At 40.0 feet...In Tennessee, long sections of Tiptonville Ferry
Road are flooded.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued this evening or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
